 24 
 25 /*global runtime, core, gui, ops*/
 26 
 27 
 28 /**
 29  * The caret manager is responsible for creating a caret as UI representation
 30  * of a member's cursor.
 31  * If the caret is for the local member, then the manager will control the
 32  * caret's current focus, and ensure the caret stays visible after every local
 33  * operation.
 34  * @constructor
 35  * @implements {core.Destroyable}
 36  * @param {!gui.SessionController} sessionController
 37  */
 38 gui.CaretManager = function CaretManager(sessionController) {
 39     "use strict";
 40     var /**@type{!Object.<string,!gui.Caret>}*/
 41         carets = {},
 42         window = runtime.getWindow(),
 43         ensureCaretVisibleTimeoutId,
 44         scrollIntoViewScheduled = false;
 45 
 46     /**
 47      * @param {!string} memberId
 48      * @return {?gui.Caret}
 49      */
 50     function getCaret(memberId) {
 51         return carets.hasOwnProperty(memberId) ? carets[memberId] : null;
 52     }
 53 
 54     /**
 55      * Get the horizontal offset of the local caret from the
 56      * left edge of the screen (in pixels).
 57      * @return {!number|undefined}
 58      */
 59     function getLocalCaretXOffsetPx() {
 60         var localCaret = getCaret(sessionController.getInputMemberId()),
 61             lastRect;
 62         if (localCaret) {
 63             lastRect = localCaret.getBoundingClientRect();
 64         }
 65         // usually the rect is 1px width, so rect.left ~= rect.right.
 66         // Right is used because during IME composition the caret width includes
 67         // the chars being composed. The caret is *always* flush against the right side
 68         // of the it's BCR.
 69         return lastRect ? lastRect.right : undefined;
 70     }
 71 
 72     /**
 73      * @return {!Array.<!gui.Caret>}
 74      */
 75     function getCarets() {
 76         return Object.keys(carets).map(function (memberid) {
 77             return carets[memberid];
 78         });
 79     }
 80 
 81     /**
 82      * @param {!string} memberId
 83      * @return {undefined}
 84      */
 85     function removeCaret(memberId) {
 86         var caret = carets[memberId];
 87         if (caret) {
 88             // Remove the caret before destroying it in case the destroy function causes new window/webodf events to be
 89             // triggered. This ensures the caret can't receive any new events once destroy has been invoked
 90             delete carets[memberId];
 91             if (memberId === sessionController.getInputMemberId()) {
 92                 sessionController.getEventManager().unsubscribe("compositionupdate", caret.handleUpdate);
 93             }
 94             /*jslint emptyblock:true*/
 95             caret.destroy(function() {});
 96             /*jslint emptyblock:false*/
 97         }
 98     }
 99 
100     /**
101      * @param {!ops.OdtCursor} cursor
102      * @return {undefined}
103      */
104     function refreshLocalCaretBlinking(cursor) {
105         var caret, memberId = cursor.getMemberId();
106 
107         if (memberId === sessionController.getInputMemberId()) {
108             caret = getCaret(memberId);
109             if (caret) {
110                 caret.refreshCursorBlinking();
111             }
112         }
113     }
114 
115     function executeEnsureCaretVisible() {
116         var caret = getCaret(sessionController.getInputMemberId());
117         scrollIntoViewScheduled = false;
118         if (caret) {
119             // Just in case CaretManager was destroyed whilst waiting for the timeout to elapse
120             caret.ensureVisible();
121         }
122     }
123 
124     function scheduleCaretVisibilityCheck() {
125         var caret = getCaret(sessionController.getInputMemberId());
126         if (caret) {
127             caret.handleUpdate(); // This is really noticeable if delayed. Calculate the cursor size immediately
128             if (!scrollIntoViewScheduled) {
129                 scrollIntoViewScheduled = true;
130                 // Delay the actual scrolling just in case there are a batch of
131                 // operations being performed. 50ms is close enough to "instant"
132                 // that the user won't notice the delay here.
133                 ensureCaretVisibleTimeoutId = runtime.setTimeout(executeEnsureCaretVisible, 50);
134             }
135         }
136     }
137 
138     /**
139      * @param {!{memberId:string}} info
140      * @return {undefined}
141      */
142     function ensureLocalCaretVisible(info) {
143         if (info.memberId === sessionController.getInputMemberId()) {
144             // on member edit actions ensure visibility of cursor
145             scheduleCaretVisibilityCheck();
146         }
147     }
148 
149     /**
150      * @return {undefined}
151      */
152     function focusLocalCaret() {
153         var caret = getCaret(sessionController.getInputMemberId());
154         if (caret) {
155             caret.setFocus();
156         }
157     }
158 
159     /**
160      * @return {undefined}
161      */
162     function blurLocalCaret() {
163         var caret = getCaret(sessionController.getInputMemberId());
164         if (caret) {
165             caret.removeFocus();
166         }
167     }
168 
169     /**
170      * @return {undefined}
171      */
172     function showLocalCaret() {
173         var caret = getCaret(sessionController.getInputMemberId());
174         if (caret) {
175             caret.show();
176         }
177     }
178 
179     /**
180      * @return {undefined}
181      */
182     function hideLocalCaret() {
183         var caret = getCaret(sessionController.getInputMemberId());
184         if (caret) {
185             caret.hide();
186         }
187     }
188 
189     /**
190      * @param {!ops.OdtCursor} cursor
191      * @param {!boolean} caretAvatarInitiallyVisible  Set to false to hide the associated avatar
192      * @param {!boolean} blinkOnRangeSelect  Specify that the caret should blink if a non-collapsed range is selected
193      * @return {!gui.Caret}
194      */
195     this.registerCursor = function (cursor, caretAvatarInitiallyVisible, blinkOnRangeSelect) {
196         var memberid = cursor.getMemberId(),
197             caret = new gui.Caret(cursor, caretAvatarInitiallyVisible, blinkOnRangeSelect),
198             eventManager = sessionController.getEventManager();
199 
200         carets[memberid] = caret;
201 
202         // if local input member, then let controller listen on caret span
203         if (memberid === sessionController.getInputMemberId()) {
204             runtime.log("Starting to track input on new cursor of " + memberid);
205 
206             // wire up the cursor update to caret visibility update
207             cursor.subscribe(ops.OdtCursor.signalCursorUpdated, scheduleCaretVisibilityCheck);
208             eventManager.subscribe("compositionupdate", caret.handleUpdate);
209             // Add event trap as an overlay element to the caret
210             caret.setOverlayElement(eventManager.getEventTrap());
211         } else {
212             cursor.subscribe(ops.OdtCursor.signalCursorUpdated, caret.handleUpdate);
213         }
214 
215         return caret;
216     };
217 
218     /**
219      * @param {!string} memberId
220      * @return {?gui.Caret}
221      */
222     this.getCaret = getCaret;
223 
224     /**
225      * @return {!Array.<!gui.Caret>}
226      */
227     this.getCarets = getCarets;
228 
229     /**
230      * @param {!function(!Error=)} callback, passing an error object in case of error
231      * @return {undefined}
232      */
233     this.destroy = function (callback) {
234         var odtDocument = sessionController.getSession().getOdtDocument(),
235             eventManager = sessionController.getEventManager(),
236             caretCleanup = getCarets().map(function(caret) { return caret.destroy; });
237 
238         sessionController.getSelectionController().setCaretXPositionLocator(null);
239         runtime.clearTimeout(ensureCaretVisibleTimeoutId);
240         odtDocument.unsubscribe(ops.OdtDocument.signalParagraphChanged, ensureLocalCaretVisible);
241         odtDocument.unsubscribe(ops.Document.signalCursorMoved, refreshLocalCaretBlinking);
242         odtDocument.unsubscribe(ops.Document.signalCursorRemoved, removeCaret);
243 
244         eventManager.unsubscribe("focus", focusLocalCaret);
245         eventManager.unsubscribe("blur", blurLocalCaret);
246         window.removeEventListener("focus", showLocalCaret, false);
247         window.removeEventListener("blur", hideLocalCaret, false);
248 
249         carets = {};
250         core.Async.destroyAll(caretCleanup, callback);
251     };
252 
253     function init() {
254         var odtDocument = sessionController.getSession().getOdtDocument(),
255             eventManager = sessionController.getEventManager();
256 
257         sessionController.getSelectionController().setCaretXPositionLocator(getLocalCaretXOffsetPx);
258         odtDocument.subscribe(ops.OdtDocument.signalParagraphChanged, ensureLocalCaretVisible);
259         odtDocument.subscribe(ops.Document.signalCursorMoved, refreshLocalCaretBlinking);
260         odtDocument.subscribe(ops.Document.signalCursorRemoved, removeCaret);
261 
262         eventManager.subscribe("focus", focusLocalCaret);
263         eventManager.subscribe("blur", blurLocalCaret);
264         window.addEventListener("focus", showLocalCaret, false);
265         window.addEventListener("blur", hideLocalCaret, false);
266     }
267 
268     init();
269 };
270
